tourName: Tamil Nadu and Kerala Tour, India
generalInfo:
CLASSIC SOUTH INDIA IN STYLE

Chennai*Mahabalipuram*Pondicherry*Chettinad*Madurai*Periyar *Kumarakom*Cochin

• Accommodation as specified in the itinerary on Double sharing basis for 15 Nights or similar
• Daily buffet breakfast at all the hotels.
• Single entry to the monuments as mentioned above.
• Spice plantation tour in Thekkady
• Jungle walk Thekkady.
• Boat ride in Thekkady
• All transfers and excursions using Toyota Innova.
• Services of an English speaking local Guides as per the itinerary
• Assistance on arrival and departure transfers.

dayInfo.description: Mahabalipuram Upon arrival in Chennai airport, you will be met by us and thereafter continue drive to Mahabalipuram, (60 Km / 2 Hrs. Approx.) On arrival you will proceed for check-in at hotel. Rest of the day at leisure Overnight at the Hotel.
After breakfast, proceed for half day excursion to Kanchipuram and later Half day sightseeing of Mahabalipuram Overnight at the Hotel.

Pondicherry After breakfast drive to Pondicherry (120 Km / 3 Hrs. Approx.) Upon arrival at Pondicherry check in to your hotel Afternoon enjoy a rickshaw ride around the French colony of Pondicherry Overnight at the Hotel.
After breakfast, Half day sight-seeing of Pondicherry, visiting Sri Aurobindo Ashram, Pondicherry Museum and Sacred Heart Church Overnight at the Hotel.
Chettinad After breakfast, Drive to Chettinad. (250 Km / 6 Hrs. Approx.) On arrival Check in at hotel, Rest of the day at leisure. Overnight at the Hotel.
After breakfast, proceed for sightseeing of Chettinad, visiting Chettinad Temple, and Chettinad Museum & Visit Temples Overnight at the Hotel.
Madurai After breakfast, Drive to Madurai. (100 Km / 2 Hrs. Approx.) On arrival Check in at hotel, Spend the rest of the day at leisure. Overnight at the Hotel.
Breakfast at hotel. Afternoon sightseeing to Minakshi Temple, Thirumalai Nayaka Palace, in the evening witness the ceremony at Meenakshi Temple Overnight stay at hotel
Breakfast at hotel. The day at leisure Overnight stay at hotel.
Periyar Breakfast at hotel. Drive to Periyar (150 Km / 3.5 Hrs. Approx.) Upon arrival in Periyar check in at hotel. In the afternoon spice plantation tour. Overnight stay at hotel.
Breakfast at hotel, Proceed after breakfast for natural trek tour at the amazing Spice Village In the afternoon shared boat ride at lake Periyar
Breakfast at hotel, Drive to Kumarakom (120Km / 3 Hrs. Approx.) . Upon arrival in Kumarakom check in at hotel. Rest of the day at Leisure Overnight stay at hotel.
Breakfast at hotel. Day at leisure for independent activities. Overnight stay at hotel.
Breakfast at hotel, Drive to Cochin (50 Km / 1.5 Hrs. Approx.) . Upon arrival in Cochin check in at hotel. Rest of the day at Leisure. Overnight stay at hotel.
Breakfast at hotel, Drive to Cochin (50 Km / 1.5 Hrs. Approx.) . Upon arrival in Cochin check in at hotel. Rest of the day at Leisure. Overnight stay at hotel.
Breakfast at hotel. Morning half day city tour of Cochin visiting Jewish Synagogue & Dutch Palace. In the evening enjoy a classical Indian dance show - Kathakali Dance. Overnight stay at hotel.
Breakfast at hotel. Transfer to airport for flight home
